## WHAT IS A PUBLIC ADJUSTER?

Miller Public Adjusters works exclusively for policyholders, **never** for
insurance companies.

#### Policy & Claims Consultants

Let our team unravel the complexities of your policy and property insurance
claim.

Read More

#### Buildings & Property Experts

Count on our experts to properly value your buildings and personal property.

Read More

#### Policyholder Advocates

Bring our team in to protect your best interests throughout your claim.

Read More

The first six months after a house fire bring non-stop challenges. Use this

successfully.

#### Meet David and his family

Losing everything they owned to a house fire was tragic. Being treated
unfairly in their homeowners insurance claim was unacceptable. So David Miller
did what he does best: **Fight for what's right**.

Learn More

## ABOUT MILLER PUBLIC ADJUSTERS

#### Why Miller Public Adjusters?

Founded for the sole purpose of helping policyholders, our team of experts
will not rest until you receive every dollar your homeowners or commercial
insurance policy promises.



#### Meet the Miller Team

When you put our in-house team of public adjusters, estimators, and personal
property experts to work on your claim, all your worries melt away.



#### Our Mission

We're here to be your trusted representative, ensuring your success through
every step of your property insurance claim process.



Learn More

#### **Share your claim story** #InsuranceClaimHelp

  *  
  *   *   *   *   *   *   * 

## LICENSED SERVICE AREAS

#### Miller Public Adjusters is the Midwest’s top public adjusting firm,
representing policyholders in Wisconsin, Iowa, Illinois, Indiana, Michigan,
Minnesota, Texas and Florida. Headquartered in Appleton, Wisconsin, we also
have offices in Chicago and Tampa.

####  Appleton

518 S. Westland Dr.  
Appleton, WI 54914

####  Chicago

300 N. Lasalle St., Suite 4925  
Chicago, IL 60654

####  Tampa

## GET EDUCATED ABOUT YOUR CLAIM

  * #### Residential and Commercial Claims

The larger your loss, the more informed you need to be about your property
claim process.

  * #### Fire | Water | Wind | Hail

The cause of your loss tells you a lot about where to look for both visible
and hidden damage.

  * #### Refuse to be Lowballed

Your property insurance policy is a promise. It's up to you to make sure that
promise is kept.

###

### Residential and Commercial Claims

Suffering severe property damage throws you into a world that requires deep
expertise to navigate successfully. From understanding your policy, to proving
the real value of your damages and negotiating a fair settlement, our site,
blogs, and free claim resources are here to help you. And so are we.

Learn More

###

### Fire | Water | Wind | Hail

Knowing where to look for damage isn’t as easy as it sounds. For example, a
fire can damage an entire home and everything in it — even if the flames were
contained to the basement. Make sure the people scoping your loss understand
how different causes impact the damage done to your home, building(s), and
personal property.

Learn More

###

### Refuse to be Lowballed

Lowball settlement offers are the #1 complaint heard from homeowners and
commercial insurance policyholders. Countering a lowball offer requires you to
control your claim and provide evidence of the value of your damages. Only
then can you negotiate a full and fair settlement for your loss.

Learn More

## OVERVIEW OF THE PROPERTY INSURANCE CLAIM PROCESS

__

#### Read Your Policy (yes, all of it)

Getting every dollar your insurance policy promises starts with knowing what
your policy provides.

__

#### Document Everything

Document everything -- damaged property, communications, expenses. Get all
promises in writing.

__

#### Reach Agreement on Scope of Loss

Get a thorough scope of loss from a reputable contractor. Reach agreement with
your carrier before work begins.

__

#### Inventory Your Personal Property

Create a thorough list of your belongings, including the age, condition and
cost of each item.

__

#### Prove Your Claim

If there were an ancient proverb about property insurance claims, it would
read, "Those who provide the best proof win."

__

#### Negotiate Your Settlement

Your settlement amount will come in pieces. Make sure you know how big each
piece should be.

View all services

## SERVICES WE OFFER

__

#### Pre-Loss

From understanding your coverage choices, to documenting and valuing your
building(s) and belongings, Miller's pre-loss experts help protect your
interests before disaster strikes.

__

#### Public Adjuster

Your insurance policy is a complex and legally binding contract. The larger
your loss, the greater your need for expert representation throughout your
property insurance claim.

__

#### Loss Consultant

Understanding buildings — how they're built, how they're damaged, and how
they're rebuilt — is foundational to assessing and calculating the full value
of a loss.

__

#### Insurance Appraiser

Our reputation for settling claims successfully makes Miller Public Adjusters
an easy choice when you need an insurance appraiser to help you resolve a
scope or valuation dispute.

__

#### Insurance Umpire

When the appraisers can't reach agreement, the umpire sets the value of your
loss. Make sure your appraiser selects an umpire with a successful track
record for achieving full and fair valuation.

__

#### Expert Witness

Many property claim disputes have to be resolved by the courts. There, too,
you'll find David Miller relied on for his expertise in buildings, personal
property, and property insurance policy language.

View all services
